name: Snail Racer 2000
description:
Snail Racer 2000 is a coop mayhem of speed, turds and money. Play with your friend as one of two characters - Blue Snail or Orange Snail. Collect coins to win as you race against another player.

Controls:

Player1: WSAD

Player2: Arrows

Player with more coins at the end of the race wins.
